DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find noninvasive test help physician diagnose detrusor overactivity ( DO ) , use urine test help diagnose bladder problem , determine treatment work , determine patient good candidate intervention like sacral neuromodulation/Interstim Therapy .
DOC.brief_title: UNGF Assessment Patients With Detrusor Overactivity Undergoing Sacral Neuromodulation
DOC.criteria: control : age great equal 18 ; female gender , ability provide inform consent complete study requirement ; subject without urinary symptom case : age great equal 18 ; female gender ; ability provide inform consent complete study requirement ; subject symptom detrusor overactivity , include urinary frequency , urgency , urge incontinence , great equal 3 month ; urodynamic diagnosis detrusor overactivity ; fail treatment behavioral modification anticholinergic medication active urinary tract infection ; currently undergo hemodialysis severe renal impairment ; bladder tumor ; uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ; post void residual great 100ml ; history use anticholinergic treatment within past 21 day ; history urinary tract operation within 6 month prior screen ; heart failure ; uncontrolled hypertension ; severe neurological disease ; history botox usage within 1 year
